name: @jsquash/avif
description: Wasm AVIF encoder and decoder supporting the browser. Repackaged from Squoosh App.

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && cp -r codec package.json README.md *.d.ts .npmignore dist
scripts.prepublishOnly: [[ "$PWD" != 'dist' ]] && echo 'Please run npm publish from the dist directory' && exit 1
